description: Working abroad is always a good experience and it looks very nice in every CV. This boy had just returned from the USA where he worked as an artist and a waiter. Unfortunately, his work visa expired and he had to return home. I was afraid he might be too good to get. Luckily, he needed money really badly. He spent everything he saved in the US to find a new flat in Prague. He loved the job at a travel agency I had for him. And following offers lead him step by step where I needed him. I must say, I´ve become very good at this after so many boys. I expected him to enjoy the ride but maybe I was too optimistic. At the end, he was so shaken by the experience that he left my office barefoot, probably couldn´t be in my presence a minute longer to put the shoes on.
title: Dirty Scout 67
